page.title: 11DAILY LIFE IN HOCKWOLD
page.content: Women are no longer in the home all day.A large % work full or part-time. All the family share in daily chores. Most houses have{labour saving devices i.e.washing mach.food freezers,micro- wave ovens,vac.cleaners etc.all with built in safety devices.{Heating} varies from solid fuel,oil or electric central heating to open fires of wood or coal but there is{no gas.Working {mothers}rely on snack,frozen & pre- packed meals to a large extent.{ {Leisure}time is spent watching T.V. listening to stereo music;video recorders are becoming popular in this area.{Home furnishings}vary from comfortable to luxury usually having safety in mind,e.g.non-slip flooring, non-inflammable materials.Many homes keep{Pets}e.g.cats,dogs,fish,cage- birds, donkeys or ponies.
